details.body:
Always check this page to ensure that you are using the most up-to-date returns and guidance notes. We welcome feedback on these documents.

Process for annual returns

From 4 October 2021, you need to complete your return of procedures online using the forms on the Animals in Science Procedures e-Licensing (ASPeL) system.

Please read the guidance documents below when you complete your form.

Supplementary instructions for completion of annual returns of procedures in the UK (PDF, 248 KB, 16 pages).

We are aware this publication may have accessibility issues. We are reviewing it so that we can fix these.

Read more about our accessible documents policy.

Guidance

  • Actual severity reporting (PDF, 161 KB, 19 pages) sets out the general principles to enable project licence holders, and those appointed by them, to accurately and consistently assign severity assessments on completion of regulated procedures
  • Severity classification of genetically altered animals (PDF, 113 KB, 10 pages) advises on the specific issues relevant to the assessment of severity of animals on ‘breeding and maintenance’ protocols.

If you have any queries about this data collection please email asrubusiness@homeoffice.gov.uk

We are aware these publications may have accessibility issues. We are reviewing them so that we can fix these.

Read more about our accessible documents policy.
